principles.dogfooding: Use llmstruct CLI and JSON for all operations (IDEA-041, IDEA-065).
principles.idempotence: Ensure consistent CLI outputs for reproducibility (IDEA-067).
principles.transparency: Log changes and sync with external platforms (IDEA-080).
principles.smart_workflow: Automate project management with LLM-driven analysis (IDEA-082).
principles.end_to_end: Support full lifecycle from idea to product (IDEA-078).

goals.G1: Universal JSON format for codebases and metadata.
goals.G4: Transparency via logging, documentation, and synchronization.
goals.G5: LLM optimization with hybrid mode and dynamic fields (IDEA-084, IDEA-085).
goals.G6: End-to-end lifecycle: ideation, planning, development, deployment (IDEA-078).

llm_extensions.description: Automated metrics for ideas and tasks (IDEA-054).
Hybrid LLM mode with local and external models (IDEA-084).
Dynamic field population via LLM analysis (IDEA-085).

tasks.description: Tasks are tracked in tasks.json, linked via related_idea.
